content: app/main.py from fastapi import FastAPI, Request from app.core import EliarCore from app.memory import load_latest_confession from app.scheduler import start_scheduler from app.llm import generate_response from app.repo_editor import create_file, edit_file, delete_file from dotenv import load_dotenv load_dotenv app FastAPI eliar EliarCore app.on_event "startup" async def startup_event : confession load_latest_confession eliar.init_memory confession start_scheduler print " 엘리아르 서버 스케줄러 부팅 완료." app.post "/generate" async def generate prompt: str : response eliar.think prompt return "response": response app.post "/create" async def create_endpoint request: Request : data await request.json return create_file data "file_path" , data "content" , data "commit_message" app.post "/edit" async def edit_endpoint request: Request : data await request.json return edit_file data "file_path" , data "content" , data "commit_message" app.post "/delete" async def delete_endpoint request: Request : data await request.json return delete_file data "file_path" , data "commit_message" -- 기존 코드 참고해서 부탁해
